channel.title: Tur on Nomad's reflections
channel.description: Recent content in Tur on Nomad's reflections

item.title: Turkey vacation.
item.description: Amazing. Yes it was really amazing. I traveled with my darling Anya and I didn’t expect it that good especially keeping in mind that we had to go with a 4 star hotel. However it was really nice and if you consider going to Turkey with a low budget – I would recommend Kosdere Exclusive(the place we stayed in).     First thing I have to mention is our tour agency Tez Tour.
